title: Where do i go to report someone
body:
I just got send a fishing  link by someone on my friends list. 
And i was wondering where i would go to report this person.

replies.body: Be wary of who you add on your friend's list, and block phishing content right away!  We'll take measures to thwart behavior like that.  If the message was from a friend of yours, you may want to reach out to them so they can secure their account.  They can also reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'd be happy to help!
